formatted_in_depth_analysis.statement: Dual decoration of Fe centers with sulfur atoms and Fe nanoclusters synergistically enhances ORR activity by breaking the symmetric electronic interface of Fe-N moieties, leading to favorable desorption of OH* intermediates.
FeNC-2 M catalyst exhibits superior ORR performance with a half-wave potential of 0.897 V and high power density in Zn-air batteries (326 mW cm⁻²) and microbial fuel cells (2790 mW m⁻²).

reflection_results.statement: Dual decoration of Fe centers with sulfur atoms and Fe nanoclusters synergistically enhances ORR activity by breaking the symmetric electronic interface of Fe-N moieties, leading to favorable desorption of OH* intermediates.
